title: Create New Player
custom_steps:
1.Locate New Player tab on left side of app
2.Fill in required Fields
3.Enter Birth Date AFTER 9/1/1995
4.Click Register
custom_expected: After clicking 'Register', International Amateur Player profile should be displayed in edit mode. Data from the widget should be populated into the profile.

title: Verify players are created successfully
custom_steps:
1. With profile still in edit mode, fill in all required fields and attach a file with necessary labels.
2. Click Register to submit player
custom_expected:
1. Player is created and user is brought back to the New Player tab.
2. On the Submissions tab, the player created should be at the top of the list with a status of "Ready."

title: Verify New Trainer Button
custom_steps:
1. Make Type be Trainer/Agent using dropdown
2. Click the New Trainer button
3. Fill out Required Fields 
4. Click Submit button
custom_expected:
1. New Trainer and Edit Details buttons should appear at the top left of the Trainer/Agent/League Info section
2. User will be brought to a new page with fields to create a new Trainer/Agent
3. First name, Last Name, Country, City are all required
4. User is brought back to the new players profile 

The new Trainer/Agent information should be filled out in Trainer/Agent/League info section

title: Verify Attached File(s) fields
custom_steps: Verify the fields for Attached File(s)
custom_expected:
Verify there is a:
-Browse Button
-Add Button

title: Attaching Files
custom_steps:
1. Click the Browse or Add button (Photos should be taken or selected from camera roll of documents to check clarity and legibility)
2. Click Use Photo Button
3. Verify Fields
4. Label File
5. Register

*Dominican Republic, Venezuela, Panama, United States or Brazil are the ONLY countries that do not require a consent form, ALL OTHER COUNTRIES DO*
custom_expected:
1. Click Browse button if picture is already save to iPad. Click Add button if user needs to take picture.
2. Brings you back to Player profile page with file attached
3. File Name, Label, Last Modified, Size, Comments and a trash can should be visible
4. Label options are Birth Certificate and/or National ID, Miscellaneous, and Registration Consent Form
5. should NOT be able to register without Birth Certificate and Registration Consent Forms

**SHOULD ADD MORE THAN ONE DOC TO EACH PLAYER PROFILE

Clicking trash bin icon should remove document.

title: Create new trainer agent
custom_steps:
1. Locate New Trainer/Agent tab on left side of app
2. Fill in required Fields
3. Click Next
custom_expected: After clicking 'Next', Trainer/Agent profile should be displayed in edit mode. Data from the widget should be populated into the profile.

title: Verify Trainer/Agents are created successfully
custom_steps:
1. With profile still in edit mode, fill in all required fields
2. Click Register to submit trainer/agent
custom_expected:
1. Trainer/agent is created and user is brought back to the New Trainer/Agent tab.
2. On the Submissions tab, the player created should be at the top of the list with a status of "Ready."

title: Verifying Submissions
custom_steps: Locate and go to Submissions tab on left side of app
custom_expected:
Information should be divided into Entered Date, Type, Name, Status 

If trainer and players are created they should be divided into a Trainer Clipboard and a Player Clipboard, Never combined under one.

title: Verify Status
custom_steps:
1. Register/submit a player/trainer
2. Save a player/trainer
3. Sync player/trainer
custom_expected:
1. Status should read "Ready"
2. Status should read "Preliminary"
3. Status should read "Synced"

title: Going Online
custom_steps:
1. Create players / trainers
2. Log out of App
3. Connect app to internet
4. log back onto App
custom_expected:
1. Player / trainers should be successfully registered / submitted
2. user is brought to app login page
3. iPad should be connected to wifi
4. User is brought to app
